column4: I like chocolate, so I like Ubuntu's color themes, so thats why I use Ubuntu.  Chocolate forever.
I don't really think brown is a great color, but chocolate rules.
actually, i switched my metacity theme to 'clean' i think, with the blueslate coloring, and then swapped the red and blue values in the default background color so it would be blue instead of brown
so i can think of it like blue chocolate.
olsen haha yeah pretty much.  and chocolate.
